QuestData.Title: Codemaster's Code
QuestData.Description: $n, the bonds holding Magatha are specially encoded. She can only be released if we get those codes.$B$BThere's a device near Codemaster Deethuk in the Bulwark to the southeast. It contains the codes.$B$BPlease obtain them.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the codes to the Elder Crone's bonds?
QuestData.RewardText: Good. Now there's only one thing left to do.
